Browse the source code of qv2ray/3rdparty/QNodeEditor/src/NodeConnectionInteraction.hpp

1#pragma once
2#include "Connection.hpp"
3#include "Node.hpp"
4namespace QtNodes
5{
6 class DataModelRegistry;
7 class FlowScene;
8 class NodeDataModel;
9 /// Class performs various operations on the Node and Connection pair.
10 /// An instance should be created on the stack and destroyed when
11 /// the operation is completed
12 class NodeConnectionInteraction
13 {
14 public:
15 NodeConnectionInteraction(Node &node, Connection &connection, FlowScene &scene);
16 /// Can connect when following conditions are met:
17 /// 1) Connection 'requires' a port
18 /// 2) Connection's vacant end is above the node port
19 /// 3) Node port is vacant
20 /// 4) Connection type equals node port type, or there is a registered type
21 /// conversion that can translate between the two
22 bool canConnect(PortIndex &portIndex, TypeConverter &converter) const;
23 /// 1) Check conditions from 'canConnect'
24 /// 1.5) If the connection is possible but a type conversion is needed, add a
25 /// converter node to the scene, and connect it properly 2) Assign node to
26 /// required port in Connection 3) Assign Connection to empty port in
27 /// NodeState 4) Adjust Connection geometry 5) Poke model to initiate data
28 /// transfer
29 bool tryConnect() const;
30 /// 1) Node and Connection should be already connected
31 /// 2) If so, clear Connection entry in the NodeState
32 /// 3) Propagate invalid data to IN node
33 /// 4) Set Connection end to 'requiring a port'
34 bool disconnect(PortType portToDisconnect) const;
35
36 private:
37 PortType connectionRequiredPort() const;
38 QPointF connectionEndScenePosition(PortType) const;
39 QPointF nodePortScenePosition(PortType portType, PortIndex portIndex) const;
40 PortIndex nodePortIndexUnderScenePoint(PortType portType, QPointF const &p) const;
41 bool nodePortIsEmpty(PortType portType, PortIndex portIndex) const;
42
43 private:
44 Node *_node;
45 Connection *_connection;
46 FlowScene *_scene;
47 };
48} // namespace QtNodes
49
